titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: UNIQUE TAX REFERENCE NUMBER (Retired) - Description

p.b: UNIQUE TAX REFERENCE NUMBER has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
The last live version of UNIQUE TAX REFERENCE NUMBER is available in the January 2014 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
